alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 3:19AM MST until November 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet, accumulating snow above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with higher amounts above 8000 feet. * WHERE...The Kaibab Plateau above 6000 feet, including Jacob Lake and the North Rim of the Grand Canyon.. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, with areas of blowing and drifting snow and near-zero visibility, at times. Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 PM Thursday: Jacob Lake 4 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
